simplenet_v0.py: implementation of single-hidden-layer neuron network
casper_v0.py: implementation of python
utilities.py: contains some helper functions
data_preprocessing.ipynb: perform data preprocessing, all traces are recorded
simplenet_validation.ipynb: perform validation on simplenet, all traces are recorded
casper_validation.ipynb: perform validation on casper, all traces are recorded
casper_spiral.ipynb: demonstrate the effectiveness of casper on solving the two spirals problem

data: contain all the data reqired
rsults: contain results through benchmark

paper: the dataset and technique paper chosen


Acknowledgement: ChatGPT has been used to provide some guidance on writing and structuring the code
